channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [GROOVY-3222] GroovyCastException with SwingBuilder.bind
item.description:
Sample code that reproduces the error

import groovy.swing.SwingBuilder
import groovy.beans.Bindable

class Model {
  @Bindable Integer value
}

def model = new Model()

def toNumber = { v ->
  if( v == null || v == "" ) return null
  try { return new Integer(v) }
  catch( x ) { return null }
}

new SwingBuilder().edt {
  frame( title: "Binding test", size: [100,60], visible: true ) {
    textField( id: "t1", text: bind(target:model,
      targetProperty: "value", converter: {toNumber(it)}) )
  }
}

The problem is that when the binding is created it doesn't use the supplied converter to transform the textField's text property (currently set as "") to model.value, marked as critical as issue affects Griffon and it would be good to fix it soon.

Here is the full stack trace

org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.typehandling.GroovyCastException: Cannot cast object '' with class 'java.lang.String' to class 'java.lang.Integer'
at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.typehandling.DefaultTypeTransformation.castToNumber(DefaultTypeTransformation.java:127)
at org.codehaus.groovy.runtime.typehandling.DefaultTypeTransformation.castToType(DefaultTypeTransformation.java:256)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
